description: Cube of the lower triangular mean matrix.
formula: Numerators of lower triangle of (a[ i, j ])^3 where a[ i, j ] = 1/i if j<=i, 0 if j>i
mathematica: rows = 9; m = Table[ If[j <= i, 1/i, 0], {i, 1, rows}, {j, 1, rows}]; m3 = m.m.m; Table[ fracs = m3[[i]]; nums = fracs // Numerator; dens = fracs // Denominator; lcm = LCM @@ dens; Table[ nums[[j]]*lcm/dens[[j]], {j, 1, i}], {i, 1, rows}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Mar 05 2013 *)
author: _Olivier Gérard_
